contest-event.event-date:
May 9, 1964 D Grand Shield British Open Spring Festival (Grand Shield) 10 Test Piece Contest British Open Spring Festival grand-shield Winners back to 1952 are as engraved on the current Grand Shield trophy. Except for 1981 to 1984 where the bands on the trophy appear to have come second, not first! Was a different trophy given to the winners? If you know the answer please let us know.

There are also results on the trophy from 1902 to 1938, but they are for the Crystal Palace Contest (see link at top of page). Jodrell Bank Belle Vue, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK May 1, 2010, 5:09 p.m. Aug. 20, 2011, 4:38 p.m. 1 West Bromwich Borough G. A. Morris 2 Greenway Selectus Band Edward Gray 3 Mirrlees Works Band Norman Ashcroft 4 1st Old Boys Association Band (Belfast) Alfie Burch Unknown Result City of Birmingham Band Unknown Unknown Result Dinnington Colliery Band Joe Armstrong Unknown Result Hepworth Band Unknown Unknown Result Reg Vardy Band Eric Cunningham Unknown Result Shepherd Group Band Unknown Unknown Result Skelmanthorpe Band Unknown Unknown Result Stretford Band Unknown
